description.value:
Prerequisite: The mech must have a phase frame.

Technomagical conduits weave through every part of the mech, constantly analyzing the mechâ€™s position and calculating dozens of other possible positions nearby. With a burst of energy, the mech can teleport to any of these destinations.

Phase (2+ PP) As a standard action, the mech instantly teleports itself and its operators to any point within 60 feet that it can see, as per @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.mUIuCkFeMLKnOypt]{dimension door}. For each additional PP expended when activating this ability, the range increases by 60 feet.
